scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run prettier && npm run tsc && npm run lint:test-docs
scripts.test: npm run build && cross-env PW_SNAPSHOT_ENABLE=true playwright test
scripts.test:ci: npm run build && cross-env PW_SNAPSHOT_ENABLE=true playwright test --grep-invert @visual --project=chrome
scripts.test:update-snapshots: npm run build && cross-env PW_SNAPSHOT_ENABLE=true playwright test specs/visual --grep @visual --update-snapshots
scripts.test:slomo: npm run build && cross-env PW_SNAPSHOT_ENABLE=true PW_SLOWMO=1000 playwright test
scripts.percy:docker: npm run build && cross-env PW_PERCY_ENABLE=true PERCY_BROWSER_EXECUTABLE='/ms-playwright/chromium-1169/chrome-linux/chrome' percy exec -- playwright test specs/visual --grep @visual --project=chrome --project=ipad
scripts.codegen: npm run build && cross-env playwright codegen $PW_BASE_URL
scripts.playwright-ui: npm run build && cross-env playwright test --ui
scripts.show-report: npm run build && npx playwright show-report results/reporter
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist node_modules package-lock.json *.tsbuildinfo logs results storage_state test-results && npm run clean --workspaces
